import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import "./product.css"; // import Chart from "../../components/chart/Chart" // import {productData} from "../../dummyData" import { Publish } from "@material-ui/icons"; import { useState } from "react"; export default function Product() { const location = useLocation(); const [newMenu, setMenu] = useState(null); const menu = location.menu; const handleChange = (e) => { const value = e.target.value; setMenu({...menu, [e.target.name]: value}); }; return (

Menu

{/*
*/}
{menu.menutitle}
id: {menu._id}
sales: 0
active: {menu.stock ? 'Active' : 'Deactive'}
in stock: {menu.qty}
); }
